news.title: Nvidia's Huang says AI computing demand is up 'substantially' in the last 6 months
news.summary: The scale of Nvidia's plans have raised doubts about whether the AI industry can secure the power needed to fuel its ambitions. The scale of the company's plans has raised doubts over whether the industry will be able to secure its power.

news.title: Borrowers head back to riskier mortgages, looking for any potential savings
news.summary: Mortgage demand weakened again but for those in the market, adjustable-rate loans are getting more popular, as they offer lower interest rates.

news.title: Verizon signs deal with AST SpaceMobile to provide cellular service from space. AST shares surge
news.summary: AST SpaceMobile announced a deal with Verizon to provide service from space beginning next year. AST SpaceMobile will provide service to Verizon customers in the U.S.

news.title: Auto giant shares tumble as European Union's new steel tariffs spark industry panic
news.summary: Shares of Europe's biggest automakers fell on Wednesday. Industry concern about the impact of the European Union’s new steel import quota plan.

news.title: Amazon launches prescription vending machines at One Medical clinics in Los Angeles
news.summary: The kiosks are operated by Amazon Pharmacy. They stock a range of commonly prescribed medications, such as antibiotics, inhalers and blood pressure treatments.

news.title: Goldman Sachs on the one thing that could turn the rally into a bubble
news.summary: Goldman Sachs strategists have taken a deep dive into current stock bubble worries for investors. They argue the puzzle pieces aren't in place yet.

news.title: Intel’s explosive stock gains this year are unsustainable, a new bear warns
news.summary: HSBC sees 35% downside potential for Intel’s stock. The company would need a technology deal with TSMC to spark a true turnaround.

news.title: Equifax’s credit-score pricing counterpunch draws praise for potential profit boost
news.summary: Equifax could realize $100 million of profit if mortgage activity remains at 2025 levels, or even up to $200 million if mortgages recover.

news.title: Why two Rust Belt towns have the fastest-growing home prices in the U.S.
news.summary: Former manufacturing hubs in eastern Pennsylvania and upstate New York saw the sharpest growth in home prices in September, according to Intercontinental Exchange.

news.title: This ‘boring’ stock and bond portfolio won’t give you bragging rights — but it does make you money
news.summary: There’s a surprisingly good long-term performance of a traditional blend of 60% stocks and 40% bonds. There is no need to buy a large number of shares at one time.
